### Added
- Add `MachineHealthCheck` for control plane nodes.
### Changed
- Fail in Helm template if `dnsMode=public` is combined with a `baseDomain` ending with `.internal`.
### Removed
- Remove unused `releaseVersion` setting from `values.yaml`.
